Purpose: to convert the existing heatmap figure (team feature set overlap showing molecular signals from tarball) so that the row dendrogram is replaced by an annotation bar panel of cancer hallmark membership

General method: for each feature, find the assciated cancer hallmark and plot an annotation bar of which hallmark (each hallmark will be a different color). if there are **no hallmarks for that feature then will say none and colored gray**. if there are multiple hallmarks for a feature then only the highest/strongest associated cancer hallmark will be selected

```{r pull hallmark mappings}
####
# Pull hallmark mappings
####
# install.packages("msigdbr")
library(msigdbr)

# Pull Hallmark to gene
hallmark_mapping <- msigdbr(species = "Homo sapiens", category=c("H")) # grab Hallmarks for homosap
hallmark_mapping <- hallmark_mapping[,c('human_gene_symbol','gs_name')] # select
hallmark_mapping <- hallmark_mapping[order(hallmark_mapping$human_gene_symbol),] # sort
hallmark_mapping

write.table(hallmark_mapping, file='../data/figure_panel_b/hallmarks.tsv', quote=FALSE, sep='\t', row.names = FALSE)
```
